backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing a color‑theme update from purple/blue to green, listing affected files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark CSS variables using a green‑based theme.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with routes for books, topics, questions, and saved items, wrapped in AppLayout.
frontend/src/components.json: shadcn-ui configuration defining styling, paths, and Tailwind integration.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with contextual back navigation, theme toggle, and saved-questions button with badge.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout with header, footer, theme initialization, and a routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/BookCard.tsx: Clickable book card component with styled icon, animations, and book metadata display.
frontend/src/components/HintsPanel.tsx: Expandable hints panel allowing showing, hiding, or revealing all hints with animated entries.
frontend/src/components/ProseContent.tsx: Renders HTML prose and injects copy-to-clipboard buttons into code blocks with toast feedback.
Provides buttons to mark a topic as completed or saved, using local-storage-backed hooks and tooltips.
frontend/src/components/QuestionSections: Renders collapsible sections for video, hints, and solution content of a topic.
frontend/src/components/SavedQuestionRow: Displays a saved question row with metadata and a remove button, triggering navigation on click.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Light/dark mode toggle button driven by the theme hook.
frontend/src/components/TopicRow.tsx: Shows a topic entry with completion and accessibility states, supporting navigation when clickable.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompletedTopics.ts: Tracks completed topic IDs in local storage and provides a toggle with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity login/logout state management and context using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useSavedQuestions.ts: Manages saved question IDs in local storage with functions to toggle or remove them and show toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Handles theme initialization, persistence, and toggling between light and dark modes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, typography utilities, animations, and custom scrollbar styles.
frontend/src/lib/data.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for books, sections, and topics and provides the full dataset for Swift interview challenges.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function combining class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BooksPage.tsx: Displays all available books as animated cards and navigates to selected book pages.
frontend/src/pages/QuestionDetailPage.ts: Shows a question's details, content, navigation controls, and related sections for a chosen topic.
frontend/src/pages/SavedQuestionsPage.ts: Lists user-saved questions or an empty state, with navigation back to each question's detail page.
frontend/src/pages/TopicsPage.tsx: Displays all sections and topics of a book with progress tracking and navigation to each topic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including colors, radii, shadows, animations, and plugin integration.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, features, and known UI issues for the Swift Interview Prep app. Includes versioning, improvement goals, and a noted hints display bug.
